name: PaintShop Pro Picture Frame File
summary: Learn about .PSPFRAME files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: PaintShop Pro is a raster image editor that comes with various tools to create graphics and edit digital photos, including camera raw images. The picture frame tool allows you to add a digital frame around an image to direct the focus of the viewer's perspective.
PaintShop Pro comes with pre-made picture frames saved as PSPFRAME files in the following directory:
You can also create custom picture frames and save them as PSPFRAME files by selecting File → Save As....

instructions: You can open a PSPFRAME file with Corel PaintShop Pro in Windows. To add a picture frame to an image of a PSPFRAME file, select Image → Picture Frame....
You can also import a PSPFRAME file by placing it in the following directory:
The picture frame will then be available in the Picture Frame Tool.
